item.title: juicedata/juicefs
item.description: JuiceFS is a distributed POSIX file system built on top of Redis and S3.

item.title: coollabsio/coolify
item.description: An open-source, self-hostable PaaS alternative to Vercel, Heroku & Netlify that lets you easily deploy static sites, databases, full-stack applications and 280+ one-click services on your own servers.

item.description: Database manager for MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQL Server, MongoDB, SQLite and others. Runs under Windows, Linux, Mac or as web application

item.title: redis/rueidis
item.description: A fast Golang Redis client that supports Client Side Caching, Auto Pipelining, Generics OM, RedisJSON, RedisBloom, RediSearch, etc.

item.title: xyproto/algernon
item.description: Small self-contained pure-Go web server with Lua, Teal, Markdown, Ollama, HTTP/2, QUIC, Redis, SQLite and PostgreSQL support ++

item.title: vercel-labs/slacker
item.description: A bot that notifies you on Slack whenever your company/product is mentioned on Hacker News. Powered by Vercel Functions & Upstash.

item.description: Embeddable and distributed in-memory alternative to Redis.
